channel.title: Sorry. You are not using Tor.
channel.description: what the ? i think i know the issue is from Tor itself not from whonix specifically , but i think i should be worried now ? after getting new identity from arm = everything back to normal. but what to do for these kinds of threats ? imagine i didnt open Tor check ! the hell...

item.source: Sorry. You are not using Tor.

item.title: Sorry. You are not using Tor.
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

TNT_BOM_BOM:

well not sure , because the result said that the ip wasnt a tor-relay

To be honest, the script behind “check.torproject.org” is both, very simple and also (because of this simplicity) rather prone for mistakes. What it does is simply check, wether your current IP/exit node, is part of this list: https://www.dan.me.uk/torlist/

If so, then it tells you, that you are using Tor. If not, then it tells you that you don’t, regardless of any fact. Now, the thing is that this list only updates every 30.minutes, so exit nodes which went online just minutes ago aren’t included. Furthermore, sometimes exit nodes are never beeing included in this list for one reason or another. As long as the IP you use is not in there, like I’ve said, you’ll get a warning even though it sometimes isn’t justified.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic

item.title: Sorry. You are not using Tor.
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
It wasn’t your real IP? If so, no need for concern. If it would have shown your real IP that would be of concern

yeah good thing it wasnt.

Very much likely a false positive. You can check that here:

well not sure , because the result said that the ip wasnt a tor-relay

check:-

https://exonerator.torproject.org/?ip=108.61.122.195&timestamp=2016-01-25

item.title: Sorry. You are not using Tor.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
It wasn’t your real IP? If so, no need for concern. If it would have shown your real IP that would be of concern.

Very much likely a false positive. You can check that here:

Whonix

ExoneraTor

ExoneraTor is a website hosted by The Tor Project that tells you whether a given IP address was a Tor relay.

Also the following iw worth reading:

Whonix

Browser Tests

check.torproject.org says "Sorry. You are not using Tor."? On false positives. And browser fingerprinting. How unique are you? On Browser Tests and B...
